yzhang_il wrote:

>
> I only can find Heritrix 1.2.0 from http://sourceforge.net/projects/
> archive-crawler/. But I noticed that some guys already began
> experiments with Heritrix 1.3.0. Thanks for your information.

There is no 1.3.0 'release'.  1.3.0 is the 'version' number of builds 
made using the unreleased HEAD of the source tree (Our system for 
version numbering is explained here: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual.html#release_numbering).  
1.3.0 is the current version on builds made after each checkin by our 
continuous build system (See here under 'Build artifacts' link on this 
page: 
http://crawltools.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/buildresults/HEAD-heritrix).

The next release will be 1.4.0.   We are driving at stabiling HEAD by 
the end of this week/start of next.  HEAD will then go into our release 
testing cycle. Takes about two weeks.  The intent is to get all bugs and 
features that are of priority 7 or greater finished before 
stabilization. See here for bugs: 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?atid=539099&group_id=73833&func=browse.  
See here for 
features:http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?atid=539102&group_id=73833&func=browse.

Yours,
St.Ack

>
